abstract: Using your phone’s cellular signal as an internet connection for your computer gets you online — but can chew through your monthly data allowance.
snippet: Using your phone’s cellular signal as an internet connection for your computer gets you online — but can chew through your monthly data allowance.
lead_paragraph: Q. Am I using more data by using my iPhone as a hot spot for my computer when browsing the web than by just browsing on my phone?

headline.main: Burning Data With a Hot Spot
headline.print_headline: An iPhone Hot Spot and Data Use
